name: Kinsfolk organization
briefDescription: Kinsfolk organization was established in 2009, having Home registered under Government of Nagaland, Societies Registration Act 1860, as Regd.No.Home/SRC/6404 dated 31st August, 2012.The organization is run by a Dynamic and enthusiastic educated youths, With the object to rejuvenate ,transformed and awaken the society where poverty, illiteracy and backwardness has dominated the entire social environment ,emphasing on development /advancement in all domains the organization is actively participating and undertaking different welfare measures to improved and maintained the society ,people and its environment to a favorable status ensuring future possibility  towards transformation/ advancement of a weaker sections focusing on rural areas. PAST ACHIEVEMENTS:	The organization is purely a voluntary and non-profit organization, where the management, project implementation and other works being executed out through members’ contribution so far. Some of the notable achievements of organization were:1.	Conducted Workshop/seminar on Educational & Career Guidance for Students’2.	Conducted coaching to State board Examination for HSLC students 3.	Organized sports, cultural fetes (Both Men & Women)4.	Organized inter –school literary competition5.Sanitation, rural development,Computer education etc
